tool.name: Transterm HP
tool.description: Add terminators to your annotated genomes via Transterm HP

param.name: gap
param.help: Score of a gap in the hairpin
param.label: gap

param.name: loop_penalty
param.help: The cost of loops of various lengths can be set using --loop_penalty=f1,f2,f3,f4,f5,...fn, where f1 is the cost of a loop of length --min_loop, f2 is the cost of a loop of length --min_loop+1, as so on. If there are too few terms to cover up to max_loop, the last term is repeated.
param.label: loop_penalty

param.name: max_len
param.help: Total extent of hairpin <= n NT long
param.label: max_len

param.name: min_stem
param.help: Stem must be n nucleotides long
param.label: min_stem

param.name: max_loop
param.help: The loop portion can be no longer than n
param.label: max_loop

param.name: min_loop
param.help: Loop portion of the hairpin must be at least n long
param.label: min_loop

param.name: uwin_require
param.help: Number of "U" nucleotides in the --uwin_length long region.
param.label: uwin_require
